description:
WRITE IT DOWN

Put your life in order. You'll never forget to buy milk, skip a dentist appointment or lose THE TASTIEST muffin recipe in your life. Customize your notes and create your own style.

STICK TO WHAT'S BEST

Enjoy a collection of adorable stickers and play around with their settings. Brighten up your memories without any effort. 

Key Features:

- Cutest stickers you've seen
- Classic notepad formula with extra steps
- Dozens of color combinations
- A safe place for your memories
- Simple design with high functionality
name: Notes + Stickers
